price: Sema: Kweli imefika, na uwongo haujitokezi, wala haurudi.
arabic: قُلۡ جَآءَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَمَا يُبۡدِئُ ٱلۡبَٰطِلُ وَمَا يُعِيدُ
footnotes: Waambie: Uislamu umedhihiri, wala uwongo hauwezi kuwa ndio njia ya kuipinga Haki. Na hizo mbinu za zamani hazirejei tena.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qul jāa al-ḥaqu wamā yub'di-u al-bāṭilu wamā yuʿīdu
